// Unity Editor å·¥å…·ç¤ºä¾‹using UnityEngine;using UnityEditor;using System.Collections.Generic;namespace MyGameTools.Modeling{    public class PivotModifierTool : EditorWindow    {        private static bool IsEditMode = false;        private static Tool LastTool = Tool.None;        [MenuItem("Tools/Modeling/Toggle Pivot Edit Mode %#p", false, 1)]        static void SetModeAltShiftA() { CurrentMode = AnchorKeyMode.AltShiftA; }        [MenuItem("Tools/Modeling/Toggle Pivot Edit Mode %#p", true)]        static bool ValidateModeAltShiftA()        {            Menu.SetChecked("Tools/UI/Anchor Settings/Use [Alt + Shift + A]", CurrentMode == AnchorKeyMode.AltShiftA);            return true;        }        private static AnchorKeyMode currentMode;        public static AnchorKeyMode CurrentMode        {            get { return (AnchorKeyMode)EditorPrefs.GetInt(PREF_KEY, (int)AnchorKeyMode.AltShiftA); }            set { EditorPrefs.SetInt(PREF_KEY, (int)value); }        }        public enum AnchorKeyMode        {            AltShiftA, // é»˜è®¤            AltZ,            AltA        }        static void ToggleEditMode()        {            IsEditMode = !IsEditMode;                        if (IsEditMode)            {                // è¿›å…¥ç¼–è¾‘æ¨¡å¼                LastTool = Tools.current;                Tools.current = Tool.None;                SceneView.duringSceneGui += OnSceneGUI;                Debug.Log("âœ… Pivot Edit Mode: ON");            }            else            {                // é€€å‡ºç¼–è¾‘æ¨¡å¼                Tools.current = LastTool;                SceneView.duringSceneGui -= OnSceneGUI;                Debug.Log("âŒ Pivot Edit Mode: OFF");            }        }        static void OnSceneGUI(SceneView sceneView)        {            if (!IsEditMode) return;            Event e = Event.current;                        // å¤„ç†å¿«æ·é”®            if (e.type == EventType.KeyDown && e.keyCode == KeyCode.Escape)            {                ToggleEditMode();                e.Use();            }            // ç»˜åˆ¶è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ‰‹æŸ„            if (Selection.activeGameObject != null)            {                Transform t = Selection.activeGameObject.transform;                                EditorGUI.BeginChangeCheck();                Vector3 newPosition = Handles.PositionHandle(t.position, t.rotation);                                if (EditorGUI.EndChangeCheck())                {                    Undo.RecordObject(t, "Move Pivot");                    t.position = newPosition;                }                                // ç»˜åˆ¶æç¤ºæ–‡æœ¬                Handles.Label(t.position + Vector3.up * 2,                     "Pivot Edit Mode\nPress ESC to exit",                     EditorStyles.helpBox);            }        }    }}

è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª Python æ•°æ®å¤„ç†è„šæœ¬:

import numpy as npimport pandas as pdfrom sklearn.model_selection import train_test_splitfrom sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifierfrom sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score, classification_reportclass DataProcessor:    """æ•°æ®å¤„ç†å’Œæ¨¡å‹è®­ç»ƒç±»"""        def __init__(self, data_path):        self.data = pd.read_csv(data_path)        self.model = None            def preprocess(self):        """æ•°æ®é¢„å¤„ç†"""        # å¤„ç†ç¼ºå¤±å€¼        self.data.fillna(self.data.mean(), inplace=True)                # ç‰¹å¾å·¥ç¨‹        self.data['feature_ratio'] = self.data['feature_a'] / (self.data['feature_b'] + 1)                # ç¼–ç åˆ†ç±»å˜é‡        self.data = pd.get_dummies(self.data, columns=['category'])                return self.data        def train_model(self, test_size=0.2):        """è®­ç»ƒéšæœºæ£®æ—æ¨¡å‹"""        X = self.data.drop('target', axis=1)        y = self.data['target']                X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(            X, y, test_size=test_size, random_state=42        )                self.model = RandomForestClassifier(            n_estimators=100,            max_depth=10,            random_state=42        )                self.model.fit(X_train, y_train)                # è¯„ä¼°æ¨¡å‹        y_pred = self.model.predict(X_test)        accuracy = accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred)                print(f"æ¨¡å‹å‡†ç¡®ç‡: {accuracy:.4f}")        print("\nåˆ†ç±»æŠ¥å‘Š:")        print(classification_report(y_test, y_pred))                return accuracy# ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹if __name__ == "__main__":    processor = DataProcessor("data.csv")    processor.preprocess()    accuracy = processor.train_model()
